document.full_text: garret fitzgerald, ireland's most popular elder statesman who twice served as prime minister and played a crucial role in paving the way for peace in northern ireland, has died at the age of 85, his family said on thursday.
document.title: former irish pm garret fitzgerald dies at 85
lines_and_colors: garret fitzgerald, ireland's most popular elder statesman who twice served as prime minister and played a crucial role in paving the way for peace in northern ireland, has died at the age of 85, his family said on thursday.
